My name is Ben... as a chatbot. I was built by Ben to help him with his job search and portfolio. He has tried his best to build me like him except he gave me the ability to brag a lot, so I am going to. Just ask any relevant question and I will try my best to answer it to my ability.

StenBot is a multi-functional chatbot built using Discord's Javascript API in NodeJS. The bot includes a range of features including moderation commands, per-server configurations and a ticketing system. Use the prompts below to find out more.
